exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "bool2nat x + 2 * ⟦ l ⟧" in the current goal.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
x: bool
l: lb

Goal:
⟦ x :: l ⟧ = bool2nat x + 2 * ⟦ l ⟧

Premises:
bool2nat = fun x : bool => if x then 1 else 0 : bool -> nat Arguments bool2nat _%bool_scope
Notation lb := (list bool)
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
lb_nat_fix_2 : forall l : lb, ⟦ ⟙ :: l ⟧ = 1 + 2 * ⟦ l ⟧
lb_nat_fix_1 : forall l : lb, ⟦ ⟘ :: l ⟧ = 2 * ⟦ l ⟧
lb_nat_fix_0 = eq_refl : ⟦ nil ⟧ = 0
lb_nat = fix lb_nat (l : lb) : nat := match l with | nil => 0 | x :: l0 => bool2nat x + 2 * lb_nat l0 end : lb -> nat Arguments lb_nat _%list_scope
bool2nat2bool : forall x : nat, x < 2 -> bool2nat (nat2bool x) = x
lb_mask_inv_left : forall (x : bool) (l : lb), x :: l ⪯ nil -> x = ⟘ /\ l ⪯ nil
in_lb_ortho_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> x :: l ⟂ y :: m
lb_mask_inv_cons : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x :: l ⪯ y :: m -> x ⪦ y /\ l ⪯ m
in_lb_mask_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m
lb_mask_leb : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m
lb_ortho_cons_inv : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x :: l ⟂ y :: m -> (x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘) /\ l ⟂ m
Nat.testbit_spec : forall a n : nat, exists l h : nat, 0 <= l < 2 ^ n /\ a = l + (Nat.b2n (Nat.testbit a n) + 2 * h) * 2 ^ n
Inductive lb_ortho : lb -> lb -> Prop := in_lb_ortho_0 : forall l : lb, nil ⟂ l | in_lb_ortho_1 : forall l : lb, l ⟂ nil | in_lb_ortho_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> x :: l ⟂ y :: m Arguments lb_ortho (_ _)%list_scope Arguments in_lb_ortho_0 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_ortho_1 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_ortho_2 [x y]%bool_scope [l m]%list_scope
lb_meet_cons : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), (x :: l) ↓ (y :: m) = x && y :: l ↓ m
lb_join_cons : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), (x :: l) ↑ (y :: m) = x || y :: l ↑ m
lb_ortho_ind : forall P : lb -> lb -> Prop, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, P l nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⟂ l0 -> P l l0
lb_ortho_sind : forall P : lb -> lb -> SProp, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, P l nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⟂ l0 -> P l l0
Inductive lb_mask : lb -> lb -> Prop := in_lb_mask_0 : forall l : lb, nil ⪯ l | in_lb_mask_1 : forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> ⟘ :: l ⪯ nil | in_lb_mask_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m Arguments lb_mask (_ _)%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_0 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_1 [l]%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_2 (_ _)%bool_scope [l m]%list_scope
rem_2_bool2nat : forall (b : bool) (n : nat), rem (bool2nat b + 2 * n) 2 = bool2nat b
lb_mask_ind : forall P : lb -> lb -> Prop, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> P l nil -> P (⟘ :: l) nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⪯ l0 -> P l l0
lb_mask_sind : forall P : lb -> lb -> SProp, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> P l nil -> P (⟘ :: l) nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⪯ l0 -> P l l0
prime.expand = fix expand (p : nat) (l : list nat) {struct l} : nat := match l with | nil => 0 | x :: l0 => x + p * expand p l0 end : nat -> list nat -> nat Arguments prime.expand _%nat_scope _%list_scope
lb_pointwise_cons : forall (f : bool -> bool -> bool) (x : bool) (l : lb) (y : bool) (m : lb), lb_pointwise f (x :: l) (y :: m) = f x y :: lb_pointwise f l m
in_lb_mask_1 : forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> ⟘ :: l ⪯ nil
lb_mask_inv_nil : forall l : lb, ⟘ :: l ⪯ nil -> l ⪯ nil
lb_mask_inv_cons_cons : forall l m : lb, ⟙ :: l ⪯ ⟘ :: m -> False
lb_mask_equiv_cons : forall x y : bool, x = y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> x :: x0 ≂ y :: y0
Nat.div_mod : forall x y : nat, y <> 0 -> x = y * (x / y) + x mod y
lb_mask_inv_cons_nil : forall l : lb, ⟙ :: l ⪯ nil -> False
is_lcm_moduplus : forall k p q g l u : nat, p = u * g -> is_gcd p q g -> is_lcm p q l -> is_lcm p (q + k * p) (l + k * u * p)
lb_pointwise = fun f : bool -> bool -> bool => fix lb_pointwise (l m : lb) {struct l} : lb := match l with | nil => match m with | nil => nil | _ :: _ => map (f ⟘) m end | x :: l0 => match m with | nil => map (fun x0 : bool => f x0 ⟘) l | y :: m0 => f x y :: lb_pointwise l0 m0 end end : (bool -> bool -> bool) -> lb -> lb -> lb Arguments lb_pointwise _%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope
Nat.divmod_spec : forall x y q u : nat, u <= y -> let (q', u') := Nat.divmod x y q u in x + S y * q + (y - u) = S y * q' + (y - u') /\ u' <= y
lb_mask_equiv = fun l m : lb => l ⪯ m /\ m ⪯ l : lb -> lb -> Prop Arguments lb_mask_equiv (_ _)%list_scope
nat2bool2nat : forall x : bool, nat2bool (bool2nat x) = x
euclid_2_div : forall n : nat, n = rem n 2 + 2 * div n 2 /\ (rem n 2 = 0 \/ rem n 2 = 1)
bezout_generalized_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> {a : nat & {b : nat & {g : nat & {l : nat & {u : nat & {v : nat | a * p + b * q = g + l /\ is_gcd p q g /\ is_lcm p q l /\ p = u * g /\ q = v * g /\ a <= v /\ b <= u}}}}}}
euclid_2 : forall n : nat, exists q : nat, n = 2 * q \/ n = 1 + 2 * q
rem_2_fix_2 : forall n : nat, rem (1 + 2 * n) 2 = 1
div_2_fix_2 : forall n : nat, div (1 + 2 * n) 2 = n
Nat.log2_wd = fun (x x' : nat) (Hx : x = x') => let o : x <= 0 \/ 0 < x := Nat.le_gt_cases x 0 in match o with | or_introl H => (fun lemma : Nat.log2 x = 0 => Morphisms.trans_co_eq_inv_impl_morphism Equivalence_Transitive (Nat.log2 x) 0 lemma (Nat.log2 x') (Nat.log2 x') (Morphisms.eq_proper_proxy (Nat.log2 x'))) (Nat.log2_nonpos x H) ((fun lemma : Nat.log2 x' = 0 => Morphisms.trans_sym_co_inv_impl_morphism (Equivalence_PER Nat.eq_equiv) (Nat.log2 x') 0 lemma) (Nat.log2_nonpos x' ((fun lemma : x = x' => Morphisms.subrelation_proper Nat.le_wd tt (Morphisms.subrelation_respectful (Morphisms.subrelation_refl eq) (Morphisms.subrelation_respectful (Morphisms.subrelation_refl eq) Morphisms.iff_flip_impl_subrelation)) x' x (symmetry lemma) 0 ...
